moves.name: X Accuracy All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the accuracy of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Full Power!
moves.effect: Drastically raises an ally’s Attack and Sp. Atk. Ensures that the ally’s next attack will be a critical hit.

moves.name: Moonblast
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Atk.

passives.name: Group Dragon Guard
passives.description: Reduces the damage all allied sync pairs take when attacked by Dragon-type moves.

passives.name: Synchro Healing 1
passives.description: Restores the HP of all allied sync pairs after using a sync move.

passives.name: Fainting Cleanse
passives.description: Removes all status conditions from all allied sync pairs other than the user just before the user faints.
